Expenditure on the Windrush Compensation Scheme
	There may be paid out of money provided by Parliament expenditure incurredby the Secretary of State or a government department under, or in connectionwith, the Windrush Compensation Scheme.
	“The Windrush Compensation Scheme” means the scheme published by the HomeOffice on 3 April 2019 which provides compensation for certain categories ofpersons in recognition of difficulties arising out of an inability todemonstrate lawful immigration status (as that scheme is modified from time totime).
Extent, commencement and short title
	This Act extends to England and Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland.
	This Act comes into force on the day on which it is passed.
	This Act may be cited as the Windrush Compensation Scheme (Expenditure) Act2020.
